text: :Pages appear in :Category:Turkish scientists This is a list of notable Turkish scientists. * Piri Reis (d. 1554 or 1555), Ottoman cartographer and admiral * Feza Gürsey (d. 1992) - elected as a member of American Academy of Arts and Sciences; mathematician and physicist * Aziz Sancar (b. 1946), received the 2015 Nobel Prize in Chemistry together with Tomas Lindahl and Paul Modrich for mechanistic studies of DNA repair * Dani Rodrik (b. 1957) * Mehmet Öz (b. 1960), scientist, surgeon and author ==Related pages== * List of scientists from the Middle East == References == * Turkish scientists Turkish
title: List of Turkish scientists
